Document.body:
404: Page Not Found

Sorry, we couldn't find the page you are looking for. Make sure you typed the url correctly. This could also be a dead link.
If you think something is wrong, open an issue at github.com/larobitrumpetl/html, or contact me at larobitrumpet@lucyrobillard.xyz or larobitrumpet@protonmail.com.

This website is currently under construction and errors such as this are expected. Please do not report anything that is broken until this website is no longer under construction.
